body.name: Coolflask 64 oz Water Bottle Insulated with Straw&3 Lids, Half Gallon Water Jug Galaxy Large Metal Stainless Steel Vacuum Flask for Gym, Sports and Travel, Keep Cold 48H Hot 24H,Turquoise
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Sunday, February 18. Order within 38 mins
features: 【Grand as the Galaxy】Coolflask half gallon 64 oz insulated water bottle has a unique matte finish, gradient powder coat, ice speckles and laser engraved logo that's sensory on the look and touch. It won't sweat or slip from wet palms, the large 64 oz capacity will keep you hydrated for a whole day without a refill.

【Vacuum Insulated】This 64 oz water bottle is made of copper-plated stainless steel with a double-wall vacuum structure, which keeps cold for up to 48 hours and hot for 24 hours so that every drop is refreshingly cool and true to its taste.

【Functional 3-Lid Pack】By using the insulated hydro-flask, you can say goodbye to scalds or spills. Gulp in large mouthfuls without spills from the easy-twist spout lid, sip hands-free from the flip-up straw lid, and refill water and add ice through the wide mouth handle lid. Water drinking has never been so fun, easy, and stylish.

【Safe and Toxic-free】Crafted with 18/8 food-grade stainless steel, this sports bottle is BPA-free, resistant to rust and corrosion, and free from odor retain, so you can take in every bit of the best flavors from each and every sip.
【Wash and Care】All Coolflask insulated water jugs are covered with lifetime warranty against manufacturing defects. Note: Not for soft drinks. Do not put it in a freezer or microwave. Hand wash only.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Purchased for a trucker that uses it daily
reviews.reviewText: This purchase was a gift for a trucker that uses it daily and loves it! He says it’s very sturdy. He likes that it has three different lids and the holder and straps is a bonus. It keeps drinks cold for several days! He says it’s absolutely awesomely essential for keeping him hydrated all day everyday. Extremely happy with this purchase. In fact for Amazon Prime days that just went past we ordered another Coolflask in a different color! Nothing but good experiences with this product. Two thumbs up!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This cup is amazing. It holds cold like nobody's business. I drink a lot of water so I need a big cup and this does the job. But that's not why I'm impressed. I have Tourettes and I need things that can handle getting hit and thrown, and this cup can take a beating let me tell you. I've had this thing for well over a year and my Tourettes has given it the full run through. It has been hit, thrown, bashed against walls and its held up. Until recently, but I'm not complaining. A cup that can handle Tourettes for over a year?! Yes. I'm buying another. And another. And another.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great container for water.
reviews.reviewText: Love the look and design. Keeps my ice all day.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good bottle but problematic lid—Update
reviews.reviewText: ———Updated after the company reached out to me———The company immediately sent a brand new lid to replace the broken lid with no hassles at all. I really appreciate their prompt attention and how easy they have been to work with. Bumping this back up to 5 stars.——————————————————————I would love to give this 5 stars, since the bottle is great, but I can’t.We bought this for my son, and it’s fantastic in every way but one. As you can see in the picture, the lid that allows you to drink from the straw broke in just a short amount of time. The mouthpiece just snapped right off, making this lid useless.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great water bottle
reviews.reviewText: The water bottle is great for keeping my water cold all day. I love the straw lid and how easy it is to just flip it up and drink. I drink a lot of water so the size is perfect. After using the bottle for a few months now it does have some wear and tear mainly to the carrier case but the handle on the straw lid did break off which is a little inconvenient but does not take away from how the bottle works. I also love the design of the bottle.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just get it!!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this at the beginning of June 2023 and wanted to get it through the summer months before giving a review. Now after 5 months of almost daily use, I couldn't be happier with my purchase. I use this as a refill means for my water bottle that I take into job sites with me and it resides on the rear floorboard of the car. It has been super durable and completely leak free, even with several tumbles over while driving or going across bumpy unpaved roads/lots to access job sites. I will typically put a couple of handfuls of ice in it when leaving in the morning ( 3:30-4:00am) and it has not once completely melted the ice while in the car while I am working. I have often gotten home nearly 12 hours later and most of the ice is still in it. That cover that it comes with works fantastic at insulating it, protecting it and coupled with the carry strap it came with, is just great! Phenomenal purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Bottle for the price
reviews.reviewText: I got this bottle because my hydro flask is a lot smaller and I’m tired of refilling it so often. This bottle is amazing. I don’t know why everyone keeps complaining about the lids popping off, I’ve not had one problem with the three lids. Great value for the price. One thing is, it does not stay cold for 48hrs but it does stay cold for about 8 hours. Not a big deal for me but could be for others. The travel bag is great and overall glad I got this. The color is also beautiful and feels like nice quality. Good dupe for hydro flask besides the temperature false advertising. Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The sip top cap leaks slightly when shaken. Not a huge problem.
reviews.reviewText: I have used the sip top cover with the straw and I always add liquid iv hydration powder to my water and ice. When I mix the water/solution the cover top thing leaks slightly. The inside is easy to clean. (as a note if you choose to order this item with the koozie cover, it comes pre-installed onto the water bottle) I wish someone had told me that prior to purchase, not a huge issue but some people may find this helpful).

The bottle is perfect and keeps my beverage cool all day long. The size is also very nice so i don't need to go back and refill my water 10 times a day. This also made me drink water more since i always have some with me all day. The bottle came with a protective sleeve and mine came ripped/cut so i contacted them and they sent me a new one right away! I was so happy and then it came and they sent me a brand new bottle! So i kept the sleeve and give the new one to my boyfriend. Genuinely nice brand wich is SO RARE these days. Also the bottle is equivalent to any popular brands out there (stanley, hydroflash...) and i prefer this one since its powder coated the paint will stay ou way longer. GET THESE NOW!

My boyfriend and I both have this bottle we got each other last year and we both love it! The bottle holder with the strap is super convenient. I love that you can choose which lid you want to use and switch it up. Keeps my water freezing cold for at least 24hrs.

reviews.reviewTitle: I love my watering can, canteen, 8cups/days water
reviews.reviewText: The best water bottle you can buy. Water stays cold for two days. The three tops hat handy and leak proof. Very well made comes with a beautiful crossbody carrying pouch. This purchase is Top Ten Stars. The texture is a nice touch too!!
Keeps my water cold as advertised and perfect to take to work and have cold water all day also the interchangeable lids is a very nice option

reviews.reviewTitle: Needs Better Insulation but still a good large water bottle.
reviews.reviewText: When I say this bottle I figured I'd give it a try figuring it might be a cheaper version of the Yeti. What I learned is the difference between the two and why the Yeti's are more expensive. Firstly Let's talk about the good things, this is a durable, nice water bottle, it has a good seal, it won't leak all over your stuff if you put it in your bag, and it didn't seem to mind or care that I left it outside in -30C overnight with water in it.So why did I go and buy another Yeti if this water bottle is so good? Well, the answer is in how well-insulated this bottle is. If you fill this bottle with ice and cold water, in the morning there will be barely any ice left in the bottle at night (12 hours ~) later. If you do the same thing with the Yeti you won't need to add ice for 4 days. I have done this multiple times with this water bottle and my Yeti bottles are the same size, they are getting the same amount of ice put in them they are being filled from the same faucet with an inline water filter/chiller on it at work. So the difference has to be the insulation, and the insulation matters when you put a warm/ hot drink in it and you work in the cold, and that's why this one factor caused me to get another Yeti for winter use.Now, if that doesn't matter to you, this is a great water bottle hell for the price buy 2 of them. I know I am still going to use this water bottle in the summertime while we work/play outside.
